page.title: 09Eskdaleside;impressions. P2
page.content:
the new resident
******* {ALSO THINKS} *******
{Mobility}is an asset. The elderly in the community are well served by free deliveries from the local shops and by friends, but for special items the nearest stockist may be 40 miles away.
The{local doctors}have an "old style", caring and personal approach. There is a local surgery.The distance to the nearest{hospital}and to a{chemist}is at present about 5 miles.
The population mixes local families, incomers,business and professional people,farmers and so on.The main {occupation}in the block is farming. PLaces of{Worship}are Roman Catholic, Methodist and Church of England.
